page.title: 13Holton wood
page.content: Holton wood is owned by Shotover Estate.There are a variety of trees at holton wood such as oak,ash,silver birch,sycamore,elder berry.Lots of bushes grow round the trees like bracken and hawrthorn.The wood is an area of scientific intrest so owners are not allowed to do things to the forest like cut down any more trees.There are many wild flowers growing in Holton wood. We saw buttercups,forget me nots,white nettels,white campion,blue bells and cow parsly.We saw ivy attached to tree trunks. It strangles the trees.We saw a weed called sterile broom.It grows around the edge of the fields. If the farmer deos not kill it with weed killer it will take over the crops. We saw fallow deer and munt deer. They keep pheasants in a pen and shoot them for sport in the autumn.
